recipesJson.name: Monkey Ballz
recipesJson.author: XxBulldogIrishxX
recipesJson.description: Banana cheesecake with a note of sweet butterscotch drizzle...I love a good creamy banana vape..It may be a little sweet for some..But for me it's just right

reviews.text: This one is a bold banana recipe with a whole lot of thickness on the back end.  In your face banana off the shake, but no complaints outta me. Really creamy exhale.  I tested again after 10 days and the cheese cake showed up and adds another layer.  Personally this reminds me of the Huntz or Heinz Banana puddings that would come in the 4 pack for a buck.  Very good overall, very sweet. Next mix I will drop the super sweet a bit.  Nice recipe.
